abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.text: As long as Turtwig 's remaining HP is 60 or less, each of Turtwig 's attacks does 30 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Giga Drain
attacks.text: After your attack, remove from Turtwig the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokémon.
